message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This round my offer is a bit better for me, but still fair considering it will be worth less next round if you decline.
Come on, Bob! It's getting less valuable by the minute! Take this deal before it's too late!
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
